name: Socks & Co
description:
Collect socks of the same color to make pairs and get the best score in the 3 difficulties available.

How to play ?

You only need drag and drop socks to make pairs and drop them into the basketball to increase the remaining time.

If you have any questions or if you encounter any bugs, do not hesitate to tell me in the comments below.

For the first game of my challenge I was inspired by a game I like :
Like a Dino 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.super_toki.giraffe&hl=fr&gl=US
